name: Road Manic
description:
Welcome to Road Manic

  • Get ready for a fast paced drifter, temple run styled VR driving game with the objective of collecting the most coins in a single run.
  • Keep those sharp wits as you fly around the cars coming towards you!
  •  Have your best score taunt you forever... or reset it with the handy button provided!
  • Save your seating position for whenever you return.
